list.desc: Worked in a startup as part of a developer team.
Mostly handled WordPress projects and frontend work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Developed different types of websites and tools in a startup.
Created small JavaScript-based tools (like calculators), PHP websites, admin panels, and MySQL projects.
Worked in a big development team and supported senior developers.
Did frontend tasks with Angular, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Helped with PHP coding and debugging.
Built full-stack web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and modern JavaScript.
Integrated OpenAI API for content features and implemented secure authentication with NextAuth.
Developed payment solutions using Stripe and Instamojo for premium access.
Managed PostgreSQL and MySQL databases for efficient data handling and backend support.
